questions: Can you elaborate on your experience as an Engineer in the water sector at Chandra, Balakrishnan and Grewal? What were your key responsibilities and achievements during your time there?
How do you believe your skills in Java, Node.js, SQL, and Data Analysis make you well-suited for a position as an Engineer in the water industry?
Could you provide an example of a project you worked on related to water engineering, and how your skills were utilized in that project?
What motivated you to pursue a career in water engineering, and what specific aspects of the field do you find most interesting or challenging?
How do you stay updated on the latest developments and technologies in the water engineering industry?
What do you believe sets you apart from other candidates applying for similar roles in the water engineering field?
In what ways do you see yourself contributing to the growth and success of a company in the water engineering sector?
How do you approach problem-solving and decision-making in a professional setting, particularly when faced with challenges in water engineering projects?

Can you discuss a time when you had to collaborate with a team to successfully complete a project in the water engineering field? What was your role in the team and how did you contribute to its success?
How do you envision your career progressing in the water engineering industry in the next 5-10 years, and what steps are you taking to achieve your professional goals?
